bio.title: About Me
bio.paragraph1: A dedicated final-year student pursuing a Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science and Engineering with a specialization in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning at Brainware University.
bio.paragraph2: My passion for technology drives me to constantly enhance my skills. I have a strong foundation in C, Python, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Java.
bio.paragraph3: I'm eager to learn, grow, and contribute to the ever-evolving field of computer science. Let's connect and explore opportunities together.
currentFocus: Full Stack Web Development at Future Interns
